By reading the prequel and sequel, thi has something to do with their generation weird tradition. And the son probably "lust" over his mom more than "love". I dont hate this type of story, although some will get triggered by this kind if things.

Honestly speaking how do people get off sharing their loved one? This dude is obviously into his mom. People are selfish beings and they're especially selfish with the ones they love, if you saw your wife or girlfriend getting hit on you'd obviously interrupt and stop them. Like what?But at the end of the day art is nice but I'm no ntr guy.

👏👏 CUCK REVIEW: This cuck got a hot mom who coincidentally is weak to a begging son and gets laid. Subconsciously decides to get himself cucked by sharing his mom with his friends. Also has a husband complex for his mother. This cuck gets *drumroll*: 2 points for incest, 2 points for hot mom, loses 3 points for being an idiot and gets 4 bonus points for nice art. And...He gets a staggering 5 points. 5/10. You could've done better.
So stupid to the point where he cuckold himself. man fuck ntr i'm never gonna like it.

im not a guy who likes to share cuz i aint touching no other guys jizz, the mc prob touched a lot when he hugged fucked her at the end. But i will fave it for the art and hot sex, (except the group ones).
arrogant netotards pretending to be netotards
